DOC.brief_summary: The propose study compare purveyor coaching ( conduct National SafeCare Training Research Center ( NSTRC ) ) local coaching support purveyor ( NSTRC ) . The outcomes interest home visitor fidelity competence SafeCare model , family engagement skill acquisition . The study also include rigorous cost effectiveness analysis , examine individual organizational factor may affect implementation .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Cost-effectiveness Coaching Models Promote Implementation Evidence-based Parenting Program
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct context nationwide implementation SafeCare , evidence-based parent training program . The primary goal research examine method coach newly train provider implement specific evidence-based practice . Thus , study , examine two different coach model affect provider fidelity competence parent 's acquisition skill train . The primary participant study local coach provide coach home visitor , home visitor provide SafeCare parent parent receive SafeCare model . A total 20 coach , 90 home visitor 270 parent propose participate study ( n=380 ) . The nature participation study similar coach home visitor , somewhat different parent . Both group ask complete variety questionnaire different time point , allow observation performance SafeCare delivery ( home visitor ) fidelity monitor coaching ( coach ) . Observations may do live via audio recording . Parent participant already enrol SafeCare service , voluntary parent-training program parent , invite participate study home visitor . Parents ' participation involve complete baseline post-treatment in-home assessment SafeCare program , respectively . Each assessment include audio-computer assisted self-interview ( ACASi ) , assessment SafeCare skill . Parents also complete 4 brief telephone interview assess satisfaction engagement SafeCare service provider competence . A detailed list data collection coach , home visitor , trainer follow : Coaches : ( 1 ) prior training/implementation , complete survey individual organizational variable relate implementation ( 2 ) allow observation fidelity monitoring coaching ( 3 ) report home visitor competence , perceive self-competence , support receive trainer ( per month 6 month ) ( 4 ) complete weekly time diary report time spend coaching ( weekly 6 month ) ; Home visitor ( 1 ) prior training/implementation , complete survey individual organizational variable relate implementation ( 2 ) allow submit observation SafeCare implementation ( 3 ) report coach competence support receive coach perceive self-competence ( per month 6 month ) ; Families ( 1 ) complete baseline post-treatment assessment involve behavioral observation survey complete via ACASI ( 2 ) complete four short telephone interview reporting home visitor competence satisfaction service .
DOC.criteria: Providers administer SafeCare ( Home Visitors Coaches ) . Parents receive SafeCare service Home Visitor also participate study . Individuals age 18 .
